hero.title: Design Your Dream Jewelry with AI
hero.subtitle: Create unique, custom-made jewelry pieces using artificial intelligence. From concept to reality in minutes.

ai.title: AI-Powered Design

step1.title: Describe Your Vision
step1.description: Tell us what you're looking for - style, occasion, preferences

step2.title: AI Creates Designs
step2.description: Our AI generates unique 3D jewelry designs based on your input

step3.title: Refine & Customize
step3.description: Chat with AI to perfect your design - adjust size, add stones, change materials

step4.title: We Craft It
step4.description: Master jewelers handcraft your unique piece with premium materials

description.title: Describe Your Dream {type}
description.subtitle: Tell us about your perfect piece
description.placeholder: Describe your dream {type}... (e.g., elegant design with diamonds, delicate patterns, modern style)
description.hint: Be as detailed as you like - mention stones, patterns, thickness, style, or any inspiration you have

ring.classic: Classic solitaire with a brilliant round diamond
ring.bold: Bold statement ring with mixed metals

necklace.delicate: Delicate teardrop pendant on fine chain
necklace.pendant: Modern bar pendant with diamond accent

refine.title: Refine Your Design
refine.subtitle: Pick your favorite or request changes
refine.selectOne: Click an image to select it
refine.priceNote: Final price may vary based on materials

studio.title: Design Studio
studio.promptPlaceholder: Describe your dream jewelry... (e.g., 'An elegant gold ring with a subtle wave pattern and a small diamond')
studio.generationFailed: Failed to generate design. Please try again.

chat.title: AI Design Assistant
chat.placeholder: Ask to modify the design... (e.g., 'Make it thinner' or 'Add small diamonds')
chat.emptyState: Describe changes you'd like to make
chat.errorMessage: Sorry, I encountered an error. Please try again.

pricing.title: Price Estimate
pricing.note: Final price may vary slightly based on exact specifications
